SITE_NAME: Location of Blue mussel collection/culturing with filtered seawater.
SITE_COMMENT: Mussels used in biomonitoring were collected from the vicinity of Solbergstrand station and cultured in filtered seawater. It is presumed that copper concentrations in this seawater will be roughly equivalent to fjord conditions.
